org.togglz.archaius.repository

Class DefaultReadOnlyArchaiusPropertySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.togglz.archaius.repository.DefaultReadOnlyArchaiusPropertySource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertySource

    public class DefaultReadOnlyArchaiusPropertySource
extends Object
implements PropertySource

    An implementation of a Togglz PropertySouce for use with a PropertyBasedStateRepository.

    This implementation is for a read-only repository; attempts to update the state by calling getEditor() throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

    See Also:
    ArchaiusStateRepository

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.togglz.core.repository.property.PropertySource
